title: World Settings
description: A list of world settings to use for a world.

GameType.title: Gamemode
GameType.description: The default gamemode for the world.

GeneratorType.title: Generator
GeneratorType.description: The generator which is being used for new chunks.

LevelName.title: World Name
LevelName.description: The name of the level shown when on the world selection screen.

RandomSeed.title: World Seed
RandomSeed.description: The seed used to generate the world.

SpawnX.title: Spawn X
SpawnX.description: The X location to use when spawning players.

SpawnY.title: Spawn Y
SpawnY.description: The Y location to use when spawning players.

SpawnZ.title: Spawn Z
SpawnZ.description: The Z location to use when spawning players.

Time.title: Time
Time.description: The current time in the world in ticks.

hardcore.title: Hardcore Mode
hardcore.description: Enable Hardcore mode for this world. (Java only)

MapFeatures.title: Map Features
MapFeatures.description: Whether generated structures are enabled for world generation. (Java only)

initialized.title: Initialized
initialized.description: Whether this world has been initialized. (Java only)

bonusChestEnabled.title: Bonus Chest Enabled
bonusChestEnabled.description: Whether a bonus chest is enabled for the world. (Bedrock only)

bonusChestSpawned.title: Bonus Chest Spawned
bonusChestSpawned.description: Whether the bonus chest has already spawned. (Bedrock only)

spawnMobs.title: Spawn Mobs
spawnMobs.description: Whether mobs are allowed to spawn. (Bedrock only)

NetherScale.title: Nether Scale
NetherScale.description: The scale of the nether compared with overworld (Bedrock only)

BorderCenterX.title: World Border Center X
BorderCenterX.description: The center X co-ordinate of the world border. (Java only)

BorderCenterZ.title: World Border Center Z
BorderCenterZ.description: The center Z co-ordinate of the world border. (Java only)

BorderDamagePerBlock.title: World Border Damage per Block
BorderDamagePerBlock.description: The amount of damage the world border will do when it moves in 1 block. (Java only)

BorderSafeZone.title: World Border Safe Zone
BorderSafeZone.description: The radius of the world border safe-zone. (Java only)

BorderSize.title: World Border Size
BorderSize.description: The radius of the world border. (Java only)

BorderSizeLerpTarget.title: World Border Target Size
BorderSizeLerpTarget.description: The new size of the world border to transition to. (Java only)

BorderSizeLerpTime.title: World Border Time Left
BorderSizeLerpTime.description: The amount of time left in the world border's movement in milliseconds. (Java only)

BorderWarningBlocks.title: World Border Warning Size
BorderWarningBlocks.description: The distance which the players will begin to see a visual warning of the world border. (Java only)

BorderWarningTime.title: World Border Warning Time
BorderWarningTime.description: The amount of time before the player will see a visual warning (seconds). (Java only)

commandblockoutput.title: Command Block Output
commandblockoutput.description: Whether command blocks should output in the chat to online operators.

commandblocksenabled.title: Command Blocks Enabled
commandblocksenabled.description: Whether command blocks should be enabled for this world. (Bedrock only)

commandsEnabled.title: Commands Enabled
commandsEnabled.description: Whether commands/cheats are enabled for this world.

dodaylightcycle.title: Do Daylight Cycle
dodaylightcycle.description: Whether the time of day should cycle, when disabled the time will stay the same.

doentitydrops.title: Do Entity Drops
doentitydrops.description: Whether entities should drop items when they are killed.

dofiretick.title: Do Fire Tick
dofiretick.description: Whether fire should spread, if disabled fire will not spread.

doimmediaterespawn.title: Do Immediate Respawn
doimmediaterespawn.description: Whether respawning should immediately happen otherwise the respawn screen will be shown. (Bedrock only)

doinsomnia.title: Do Insomnia
doinsomnia.description: Whether phantoms can spawn in the nighttime. (Bedrock only)

domobloot.title: Do Mob Loot
domobloot.description: Whether entities should drop items when they are killed.

domobspawning.title: Do Mob Spawning
domobspawning.description: Whether mobs should spawn naturally in the world.

dotiledrops.title: Do Tile Drops
dotiledrops.description: Whether blocks should drop items when broken.

doweathercycle.title: Do Weather Cycle
doweathercycle.description: Whether the weather should cycle, if disabled there will be no weather in the world.

doLimitedCrafting.title: Do Limited Crafting
doLimitedCrafting.description: Whether players should only be able to craft recipes that they've unlocked. (Java only)

drowningdamage.title: Drowning Damage
drowningdamage.description: Whether drowning damage is enabled in the world. (Bedrock only)

falldamage.title: Fall Damage
falldamage.description: Whether fall damage is enabled in the world. (Bedrock only)

firedamage.title: Fire Damage
firedamage.description: Whether fire damage is enabled in the world. (Bedrock only)

ForceGameType.title: Force Gamemode
ForceGameType.description: Whether the default gamemode for the world should be enforced on all players. (Bedrock only)

functioncommandlimit.title: Function Command Limit
functioncommandlimit.description: The number of commands which can be used in a function file. (Bedrock only)

keepinventory.title: Keep Inventory
keepinventory.description: Whether the inventory should be kept when a player dies.

mobgriefing.title: Mob Griefing
mobgriefing.description: Whether mobs are allowed to grief the world.

naturalgeneration.title: Natural Regeneration
naturalgeneration.description: Whether players can regenerate health naturally if hunger is full.

randomtickspeed.title: Random Tick Speed
randomtickspeed.description: The tickspeed to use for the game, 0 disables ticking.

sendcommandfeedback.title: Send Command Feedback
sendcommandfeedback.description: Whether commands should output in the chat to online operators.

showcoordinates.title: Show Coordinates
showcoordinates.description: Whether co-ordinates should be accessible to the client. (Bedrock only)

showdeathmessages.title: Show Death Messages
showdeathmessages.description: Whether death messages should be shown in the chat.

tntexplodes.title: TNT Explodes
tntexplodes.description: Whether TNT can explode when lit. (Bedrock only)

announceAdvancements.title: Announce Advancements
announceAdvancements.description: Whether getting an advancement should be shown in the chat. (Java only)

disableElytraMovementCheck.title: Disable Elytra Movement Check
disableElytraMovementCheck.description: Whether advanced movement checks should be disabled for elytra. (Java only)

logAdminCommands.title: Log Admin Commands
logAdminCommands.description: Whether admin commands should be logged to the server log. (Java only)

reducedDebugInfo.title: Reduced Debug Info
reducedDebugInfo.description: Whether the debug screen (F3) shows reduced information. (Java only)

spectatorsGenerateChunks.title: Spectators Generate Chunks
spectatorsGenerateChunks.description: Whether spectators cause new chunks to be generated. (Java only)

spawnradius.title: Spawn Radius
spawnradius.description: The radius used for picking a location from the Spawn X, Y, Z

maxEntityCramming.title: Max Entity Cramming
maxEntityCramming.description: The maximum number of entities in one block before taking damage. (Java only)

maxCommandChainLength.title: Max Command Chain Length
maxCommandChainLength.description: The maximum amount of chain command blocks which can be run from a another command block.

gameLoopFunction.title: Game Loop Function
gameLoopFunction.description: The function to call from the Minecraft game loop. (Java only)

ConfirmedPlatformLockedContent.title: Confirmed Platform Locked Content
ConfirmedPlatformLockedContent.description: Whether this content is platform locked. (Bedrock only)

hasBeenLoadedInCreative.title: Has Been Loaded In Creative
hasBeenLoadedInCreative.description: Whether the map has been loaded in creative before. (Bedrock only)

hasLockedBehaviorPack.title: Has Locked Behavior Pack
hasLockedBehaviorPack.description: Whether the behaviour pack is locked. (Bedrock only)

hasLockedResourcePack.title: Has Locked Resource Pack
hasLockedResourcePack.description: Whether the resource pack is locked. (Bedrock only)

immutableWorld.title: Immutable World
immutableWorld.description: Indicates whether the world can be modified. (Bedrock only)

isFromLockedTemplate.title: Is From Locked Template
isFromLockedTemplate.description: Whether the map was created from a locked template. (Bedrock only)

isFromWorldTemplate.title: Is From World Template
isFromWorldTemplate.description: Whether the map was created from a world template. (Bedrock only)

isWorldTemplateOptionLocked.title: Is World Template Option Locked
isWorldTemplateOptionLocked.description: Whether the world template option is locked. (Bedrock only)

LimitedWorldOriginX.title: Limited World Origin X
LimitedWorldOriginX.description: Legacy, used to indicate where limited world generation started. (Bedrock only)

LimitedWorldOriginY.title: Limited World Origin Y
LimitedWorldOriginY.description: Legacy, used to indicate where limited world generation started. (Bedrock only)

LimitedWorldOriginZ.title: Limited World Origin Z
LimitedWorldOriginZ.description: Legacy, used to indicate where limited world generation started. (Bedrock only)

texturePacksRequired.title: Texture Packs Required
texturePacksRequired.description: Whether texture packs are required for the map. (Bedrock only)

DifficultyLocked.title: Difficulty Locked
DifficultyLocked.description: Whether the difficulty for this world can be modified by the client. (Java only)

lightningLevel.title: Lightning Level
lightningLevel.description: Determines how heavy the lightning is. (Bedrock only)

lightningTime.title: Lightning Time
lightningTime.description: The number of ticks until lightning will be triggered. (Bedrock only)

rainLevel.title: Rain Level
rainLevel.description: Determines how heavy the rainfall is. (Bedrock only)

rainTime.title: Rain Time
rainTime.description: The number of ticks until raining will be triggered.

raining.title: Raining
raining.description: Whether it is raining in the world. (Java only)

thundering.title: Thundering
thundering.description: Whether is is thundering in the world. (Java only)

thunderTime.title: Thunder Time
thunderTime.description: The number of ticks until thundering will be triggered. (Java only)

clearWeatherTime.title: Clear Weather Time
clearWeatherTime.description: The number of ticks until clear weather will be triggered. (Java only)

DayTime.title: Day Time
DayTime.description: The current time of day, 0 is sunrise, 6000 is mid day, 12000 is sunset (Java only)

CenterMapsToOrigin.title: Center Maps To Origin
CenterMapsToOrigin.description: Whether maps should be centered to the origin of the map. (Bedrock only)

educationFeaturesEnabled.title: Education Features
educationFeaturesEnabled.description: Whether this map has education features enabled. (Bedrock only)

eduLevel.title: EDU Level
eduLevel.description: The level of the EDU features to use. (Bedrock only)

serverChunkTickRange.title: Server Chunk Tick Range
serverChunkTickRange.description: The number of chunks to tick server-side. (Bedrock only)

startWithMapEnabled.title: Start With Map Enabled
startWithMapEnabled.description: Whether new players start with a map. (Bedrock only)

worldStartCount.title: World Start Count
worldStartCount.description: The number of times the world has been started (used for entity ids) (Bedrock only)

useMsaGamertagsOnly.title: Use MSA Gamertags Only
useMsaGamertagsOnly.description: Whether the world is restricted to Microsoft Accounts only (no local play). (Bedrock only)

MultiplayerGame.title: Multiplayer Game Enabled
MultiplayerGame.description: Whether this is a multiplayer game. (Bedrock only)

MultiplayerGameIntent.title: Visible to Multiplayer
MultiplayerGameIntent.description: Whether the world should broadcast multiplayer intents. (Bedrock only)

XBLBroadcastIntent.title: MS Visibility
XBLBroadcastIntent.description: The visibility of this world via microsoft services. (Bedrock only)

LANBroadcast.title: LAN Broadcast Enabled
LANBroadcast.description: Whether the map will LAN broadcast. (Bedrock only)

LANBroadcastIntent.title: Visible to LAN Players
LANBroadcastIntent.description: Whether the world should broadcast lan intents. (Bedrock only)
